sentences.sentence: You've no right to take that, you thieving swine!
sentences.translation: 你没有权利把那拿走，你这个贪心的贼！

sentences.sentence: He vowed to wreak vengeance on his unfaithful, thieving wife.
sentences.translation: 他发誓要报复对自己不忠、爱偷东西的妻子。

sentences.sentence: Take your thieving hands off my radio!
sentences.translation: 你那双贼手别碰我的收音机！
